data.description:
It's a beautiful day out here in the countryside. Might as well enjoy it doing your job. Grow some plants, sell some veggies, or head to town to buy some new tools for the farm.

Our goal is to release regular content updates, new mechanics, and tweaks to existing systems based on community feedback and discussions, so we would love for you to join us on our discord and help us shape this game!

https://discord.gg/mM2UsAF

Features
Enjoy the countryside.
Grow more than 15 different kinds of plants.
Sell vegetables to gain money and buy new tools.
Work hard or hardly work.
Save the game inside your house.
Do some fishing.
Do some mining.
Do some cooking.
Play with real time OR play with a faster simulated time.
Unlock items for your house or the farm!
Climb some trees and pick some apples.

The big 1.2.0 update! We wish you all a happy new year and will see you on the next one!

Features
- HUGE graphical update. Lights are now baked into the scenes causing lot's of shadows to also show up in the distance.
- HUGE performance improvements. (from 45fps to around 70fps).
- Running now only requires a click of the joystick instead of holding it down.
- The chest in the shed now shares storage with other locations (farm, mine, ranch, home).
- Added 2 more pages to the shared chest.
- Increased resolution for tooltips.
- Tooltip now works from both hands. You can use tooltips per hand now.
- Added setting: refresh rate switcher (72, 80, 90, 120).
- Added setting: toggle fog.
- Windows are now reflective.
- Portals now nicely fade in particles when moving close instead of instantly.
- Made item grabbing feel way more snappy. (Can't explain, try it).
- Resized talk dialog to fit multiple quests
- Broken save files now nicely show an error to see whats up.
- Added parkouring on lantern poles & fences
- Replaced night lights with fake lights for optimal performance.
- Updated two-handed item mechanics + physics.

Bug fixes
- Fixed endlessly falling in mine.
- Fixed falling through the map in mine.
- Fixed module flickering in the mine.
- Fixed save bleeding when selecting other saves when switching.
- Fixed saves overwriting other saves on file renames.
- Catched game crash during migration so other saves are still be playable.
- Fixed hands falling on the floor on Pickaxe.
- Decreased chance animals becoming stuck in environment.
- Limited range of UI pointers to 3 meters.
- Fixed npc dialog to not show up in some stores.
- Fixed shellfinder quest not being finishable.
- Updated cotten seeds selling price in description to match actual price.
- Fixed christmas ui label.
- Fixed fading camera bug.
- Fixed position of flowers in village.
- Updated items that weren't physics based to be physics based (hats, beach ball, etc).

Technical changes
- Added ingame console. (especially handy for finding errors on Quest)
- Added HarvestSettings tab to Unity Editor with handy toggles for development.
- Removed lot's of unused project files.
- Simplified Item code.
- Simplified Contracts code.
- Simplified modulair mine code.
- Simplified Questing code (Waaaay less error prone).
- Simplified unlocking code (Less error prone).
- Simplified tooltips code (super performance increase).
- Simplified UI indicators code (super performance increase).
- Switched some settings as per recommendation of oculus docs.
- Switched palette shaders to simple lit instead of lit.
- Disable animations when far away.
- Disable fish completely when far away.
- PC player is no longer in memory. Not added when not needed.
- Performance optimization which save about 0.4ms in the farm.

Updated packages
- Updated OculusXR: 3.0.2.
- Updated Input system: 1.4.4.
- Updated XR Interaction Toolkit: 2.0.4
- Updated Unity Editor: 2021.3.

- Christmas will now be run every complete december month.
- Floor in home is fixed.
- Message board has been updated.
